name: Dagger
description: A small, easily concealed blade useful for close combat and utility tasks.

name: Shortsword
description: A light one-handed sword balanced for quick strikes and parries.

name: Longsword
description: A versatile sword effective for slashing and thrusting.

name: Greatsword
description: A heavy two-handed blade that deals powerful blows at the cost of speed.

name: Shortbow
description: A compact bow for ranged attacks at moderate distances.

name: Longbow
description: A long-range bow favored by skilled archers for accuracy and reach.

name: Light Crossbow
description: A mechanically simple ranged weapon that fires bolts with force.

name: Spear
description: A pole weapon useful for thrusting and throwing at short range.

name: Quarterstaff
description: A sturdy wooden staff used for defense and simple strikes.

name: Mace
description: A blunt weapon with a heavy head, effective against armored foes.

name: Leather Armor
description: Light armor made from treated hides; offers mobility with modest protection.

name: Studded Leather
description: Leather reinforced with metal studs for improved defense while remaining light.

name: Chain Shirt
description: A flexible layer of interlocking rings worn under clothing or armor.

name: Scale Mail
description: Overlapping metal scales that balance protection and flexibility.

name: Chain Mail
description: Heavy interlinked rings providing solid protection at the cost of mobility.

name: Plate Armor
description: Full metal plates offering maximum protection for heavily armored warriors.

name: Shield
description: A handheld shield that provides additional protection when used in combat.

name: Arrows (20)
description: A bundle of twenty arrows for bows.

name: Bolts (20)
description: A set of twenty crossbow bolts.

name: Backpack
description: A sturdy pack for carrying gear, pouches, and small supplies.

name: Bedroll
description: A simple roll of blankets and cloth for sleeping outdoors.

name: Rations (1 day)
description: Preserved food and provisions sufficient for one person for a day.

name: Waterskin
description: A leather container for carrying water or other liquids.

name: Torch
description: A simple flame source for light; burns for a limited time.

name: Lantern, Hooded
description: A lantern with a hood to control light direction and reduce glare.

name: Flint and Steel
description: A basic kit for starting fires reliably.

name: Rope, Hempen (50 ft)
description: A length of sturdy rope useful for climbing, tying, and hauling.

name: Grappling Hook
description: A metal hook used with rope to secure a line to a surface.

name: Crowbar
description: A metal bar used for prying open doors, crates, and other obstacles.

name: Hammer and Pitons
description: A small hammer and metal spikes for securing ropes and anchors.

name: Fishing Tackle
description: Basic gear for catching fish while traveling or camping.

name: Signal Whistle
description: A small whistle used to attract attention or send simple signals.

name: Torch, Bullseye (special)
description: A brighter, longer-burning torch variant for extended illumination.

name: Healer's Kit
description: Bandages and salves for stabilizing and treating wounds in the field.

name: Climber's Kit
description: Tools and equipment to aid climbing and secure anchors.

name: Thieves' Tools
description: A compact set of picks and small tools for manipulating locks and traps.

name: Smith's Tools
description: Hammers, tongs, and files for metalworking and repairs.

name: Herbalism Kit
description: Pouches and tools for identifying and preparing medicinal herbs.

name: Navigator's Tools
description: Instruments for charting courses and reading maps at sea or on land.

name: Backpack, Explorer's
description: A reinforced pack with compartments for long expeditions.

name: Pouch (small)
description: A small leather pouch for coins and tiny items.

name: Sack (large)
description: A large cloth sack for bulkier supplies.

name: Common Clothes
description: Everyday garments suitable for travel and townsfolk.

name: Traveler's Clothes
description: Durable clothing designed for long journeys and rough weather.

name: Fine Clothes
description: High-quality garments suitable for formal occasions.

name: Horse, Riding
description: A trained riding horse for travel and light work.

name: Donkey
description: A sturdy pack animal useful for carrying supplies over rough terrain.

name: Cart (two-wheeled)
description: A small cart for hauling goods behind animals.

name: Saddle, Riding
description: A basic saddle for comfortable riding and control.

name: Gemstone (small)
description: A small polished gem used as trade or luxury currency.

name: Silk Bolt
description: A length of fine silk fabric prized for clothing and decoration.

name: Iron Ingot
description: A bar of smelted iron used in crafting and trade.

name: Lute
description: A stringed instrument used for performance and entertainment.

name: Drum
description: A percussion instrument used for rhythm and signaling.

name: Lockbox (small)
description: A small locked chest for securing valuables.

name: Map Case
description: A waterproof tube for storing maps and documents.

name: Healing Potion (minor)
description: A small vial of restorative liquid that mends minor wounds.

name: Antitoxin
description: A potion that helps resist the effects of common poisons.

name: Ink and Quill
description: Basic writing supplies for recording notes and maps.

name: Paper (10 sheets)
description: Sheets of paper for letters, maps, and records.

name: Torch, Signal
description: A torch designed to produce a bright, visible signal at distance.

name: Bell
description: A small bell used for alarms or signaling.

name: Sewing Kit
description: Needles, thread, and small tools for repairing clothing and gear.

name: Cook's Utensils
description: Pots, pans, and utensils for preparing meals while traveling.

name: Blanket
description: A warm blanket for sleeping outdoors or in cold conditions.

name: Winter Cloak
description: A heavy cloak designed to protect against cold and wind.

name: Torch, Oil (1 flask)
description: A small flask of lamp oil used to fuel lanterns and torches.

name: Oil (1 flask)
description: A flask of oil used for lamps, lubrication, or improvised traps.

name: Saddle, Pack
description: A saddle designed to carry cargo on pack animals.

name: Hunting Trap
description: A mechanical trap for catching small to medium game.
